content: Hello everyone! We are all very excited about the Connectathon. In preparation for tomorrow, I have attached our "Connectathon Kick Off" slide deck >2020-5-13_PACIO-eLTSS-PAC-Transition_Track-Kick-Off.pptx

Hello all! Our Connectathon JSON files are located at :https://github.com/paciowg/sample-data/blob/master/2020-05%20HL7%20May%20Connectathon/sample%20data/Full%20Data_Seed_Story_Connectathon%20May%202020.zip

Hi all, PACIO Project hosted a Track Orientation today! Meeting recordings and the slide deck presented are on the track page at https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2020-09+PACIO-eLTSS+Post-Acute+Care+Transition+Summary

Siama/Sean - I think I ran into a typo in the "MedicationStatement" resources. There is a reference within the JSON sample data files that Caleb generated that appears to be invalid. Attached is a sample file "MedicationStatement-Medication-Statement-1.json". Please take a look at the reference - "basedOn:reference:Medication-Request-1". I believe this should be "basedOn:reference:MedicationRequest/Medication-Request-1". There are 9 MedicationStatement JSON files that may need to be fixed if this is true. MedicationStatement-Medication-Statement-1.json

Forrest White said:

@Caleb Wan
